completions.nl_description: Extend all objects diagonally, if they are neighbors of the object of color green.
Extend all objects of size 1 toward the object of maximum size, without overlapping
Move all objects of size 1 to the nearest neighbor of the same color, and recolor them to color Y.
Move all objects of size 1 that are neighbors with an object of size 4 one step up.
Move all objects of color different than O, toward the object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Move each instance of color Y one step up and one step down to extend them.
Move objects of size 1 one step in the direction of neighboring objects of the same color.
Add border of color Y to objects that have a neighbor of color Y.
Move all objects of size 1 diagonally to the neighboring cells, leaving a trail of the same color, until the edges are reached.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (size_equals (size_of this) 1)
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node up_left false)
            (extend_node up_right false)
            (extend_node down_left false)
            (extend_node down_right false)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Insert objects of maximum size into the position of any neighbor if they match the original shape and color.
Move all object of size 1 towards any neighbor object of a different color.
For all objects of color 'A', if they have neighboring objects of color 'Y', move the neighboring objects closer to the respective 'A' object.
Add a border color to all objects in an up-and-down alternate pattern.
Recolor all shape changing objects to Y. Shape changing objects are objects that are adjacent to objects of different colors.
Recolor all objects of size 1 with color Y.
Move all objects of color different than O one step towards any neighboring objects.
Recolor all objects of color Y
Move objects of color Y to the border when they are neighbors of other objects.
Recolor all neighbors of an object of color Y to color Y.
Recolor the neighbors of the object of color A to color Y.
Move all objects of color different than O toward the objects of color O, if they are neighbors of it
Add indicators in color for the objects intersecting in a straight line.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) Y))
        (apply (update_color A))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor the neighbors of the objects of size 1 to color Y.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the nearest neighboring object of size greater than 1.
For all objects of size 1, move them up and change their color to match the color of the neighbor object.
Move all objects of size 1 in the direction of the objects of size 2, and then recolor them to G.
Move all objects of size 1 that are neighbors of an object of size 5.
Move all objects of size 1 towards objects of size 2 that are neighbors.
Extend all the objects of size 1 toward the object of size 3, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color different than O to the same row or column as the object of color O if they are neighbors, and then recolor them to match the color of the object of color O
Move all objects of color W one step left and one step right respectively.
Move nodes of color other than O to neighbor nodes of matching color.
Add the same color to the neighboring sides of horizontally aligned objects.
Duplicate and move objects toward the center column and update their color to Y.
Move all objects of size 1 towards their neighboring object, and then recolor them to color Y if they have moved.
Move all non-X objects at the boundaries of a contiguous block of non-X cells to the boundary, if they are neighbors of an object on the boundary of that block.
Move all objects of width 1 of color different than O towards the object with width 3 next to them.
Add a border of color to all objects of size 1.
Recolor all neighboring cells of each isolated central cell to Y.
Move all objects of size 1 to be neighbors of the nearest object of the same color.
Move all objects to fit between neighboring objects of same color and adjacent objects of different color.

Move all objects of size 1 one step up and then recolor them to the same color as the largest object.
Move all objects of color different than O, toward the object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor the neighbors of all objects of color A to color Y, then move the objects themselves one step down.
Move all objects to replicate one layer towards the North and the South.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of size larger than 1, if they are neighbors of it.
Add a border of color around all Y objects.
Move all objects of size 1 towards their neighboring object of size 3, then change their color to Y.
Add color (Y) to the neighbors of objects with color (A) of size 1.
Move all objects of size 1 that are neighbors of an object of size 3 vertically to occupy the two spaces above and below the object of size 3.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of size 2, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 1 one step away from the object of size 3, in both input and output grids.
Move all objects of size 1 one step diagonally (up_left for A and F, up_right for G, and down_left for W), and then recolor them to color Y.
Move objects of size 1 one step up if they are neighbors of objects of size 6.
Move all objects of size 3 one step toward the neighbor object of size 1.

Move all objects of color different than O, toward the object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Replace the corner cells of all objects with color Y
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (shape_equals (shape_of this) enclosed))
        (apply
            (insert 0 top_left source)
            (insert 0 top_right source)
            (insert 0 bottom_left source)
            (insert 0 bottom_right source)
            (update_color Y)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor the objects of size 1 to Y if they are neighbors of the objects with size greater than 1.
Move all Y-colored objects one step up
Move the objects of size 1 on border row/column and size 3 to be vertical/horizontal symmetric with column/row and  replace with color of border object inside object, without overlapping.
Add one step orthogonal neighbors to the all F color objects, then recolor them to G.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) F)
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node right false)
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
            (update_color G)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all white cells neighboring non-white cells in the direction of the non-white cells.

Move all yellow objects one step towards the closest neighboring object of color A.
Move all objects of color different than O, toward their respective center columns if their size is larger than 1.
Move all objects of size 1 towards the objects of size 3, and then recolor them to color Y.

Add a border of color corresponding to the adjacent color to all objects.

completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) 1) (and (neighbor_of this other) (size_equals (size_of other) 2)))) (apply (move_node_max (direction_of other)) (update_color Y))) (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) 1) (and (neighbor_of this other) (size_equals (size_of other) 2)))) (apply (move_node_max (direction_of other)))))

completions.nl_description: Move objects of color different than O towards the color O if they are neighbors of it and update color to Y.
Move all objects of size 1 that are neighbors of objects of size 4 diagonally towards them.
Insert color Y objects in the middle of adjacent pairs of Y objects.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the top of the grid.
Extend all objects of size 1 as neighbors in the same color, without overlapping.
Move objects of color different from O and Y vertically toward adjacent objects of color Y.
Extend all the objects in the grid (both squares and lines) toward their neighboring similarly colored objects, without overlapping.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of this) (color_of other))))
        (apply (extend_node (direction_of other) false))
    )
)
